heading: ***WINTER STORM WATCH FOR EASTERN NY AND CENTRAL GREEN MOUNTAINS FRIDAY AFTERNOON INTO SATURDAY MORNING***Today
text: Becoming mostly sunny, mixed with clouds south of the Adirondacks into southwest VT and the Berkshires. Highs in the 30s. Winds light and variable.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear early, then increasing clouds. Lows in the teens, near 10 in the cold spots northeast, low 20s southwest. Winds light and variable.

heading: Friday
text: Early sun northeast giving way to clouds. Snow or a winter mix starting in Hudson Valley and southwest VT by midday, reaching northeast by evening. Highs in the 30s. Winds light, becoming south to southeast 5 to 10 mph.
